mapper.sql: id, username, password, cellphone, email, created, created_by, modified, modified_by
id, username, password, cellphone, email, created, created_by, modified, modified_by, description
mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO t_user
username, password, cellphone, email,
created,
created_by,
modified,
modified_by,
description,
VALUES
#{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cellphone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{created,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{createdBy,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{modified,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{modifiedBy,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{description,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR},
mapper.update:
UPDATE t_user
username = #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
password = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
cellphone = #{cellphone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
email = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
created = #{created,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
created_by = #{createdBy,jdbcType=INTEGER},
modified = #{modified,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
modified_by = #{modifiedBy,jdbcType=INTEGER},
description = #{description,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR},
WHERE id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
